content: ## Edit output data To edit output data: 1. Run the node to load data. 2. In the **OUTPUT** view, select **JSON** to switch to JSON view. 3. Select **Edit** ![Edit data icon](/_images/data/data-pinning/edit-data.png){.off-glb}. 4. Edit your data. 5. Select **Save**. n8n saves your data changes and pins your data.
